levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attack interval <@ba.vup>slightly reduced</>
<$ba.overdrive>Overload</>: ATK instead <@ba.vup>+{horn_s_3[overload_start].atk:0%}</>, gradually lose HP ({horn_s_3[overload_start].hp_ratio:0%} Max HP/sec after {horn_s_3[overload_start].damage_duration} seconds)<@ba.rem>Skill can be manually deactivated</>
